column4: hi, how do i check how much ram i have on my machine on ubuntu?
i cant find it in Device Manager
that commmand will give you how much ram you have
top will as well and so will htop if you install it
shud i look at the cache size?
its not all that accurate use top
thx gnomefreak but the thing is that i pluged in a new stick of 256 mb ram, i shud hav 512 mb, its still showing 256 only
so i dont need it to be too accurate
what i wil do is remove 1 ram n see how much ram the system shows
then i wil know if both sticks r working
